00026 class ParserErrorReporter : public ErrorHandler {
00027 private:
00029      std::vector<Error> mErrors;
00030 
00031 public:
00037      inline bool errorsOccurred() const { return !mErrors.empty(); }
00038 
00044      inline void warning(const SAXParseException& toCatch) {}
00045      inline void error(const SAXParseException& toCatch);
00046      inline void fatalError(const SAXParseException& toCatch);
00047 
00053      inline std::vector<Error> errors() const { return mErrors; }
00054 
00058      inline void resetErrors() { mErrors.clear(); }
00059 };
00060 
00066 inline void ParserErrorReporter::error(const SAXParseException& toCatch)
00067 {
00068      Error e;
00069      e << "Error at file \"" << StrX(toCatch.getSystemId()) << "\", line " << toCatch.getLineNumber()
00070        << ", column " << toCatch.getColumnNumber() << "\n   Message: " << StrX(toCatch.getMessage());
00071      mErrors.push_back(e);
00072 }
00073 
00079 inline void ParserErrorReporter::fatalError(const SAXParseException& toCatch)
00080 {
00081      Error e;
00082      e << "Fatal Error at file \"" << StrX(toCatch.getSystemId()) << "\", line " << toCatch.getLineNumber()
00083        << ", column " << toCatch.getColumnNumber() << "\n   Message: " << StrX(toCatch.getMessage());
00084      mErrors.push_back(e);
00085 }
